description:
Amami meets the ghost of a young girl who keeps repeating a
mysterious nonsense word: "Morya." No longer able to recall her life
or how she died, the roll-call samurai and Amami worry she may simply
fade away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minna de, Issho ni Asobun Desu.
みんなで, 一緒に遊ぶんです.
